title:
Who is responsible for trimming trees over the road that hit trucks and boats?

A branch fell after a truck passed under it and almost landed on the car ahead of me. Thanks
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2014/06/who-is-responsible-for-trees-leaning-perilously-over-a-road-the-property-owner-or-the-county/
